Title: New Best Friends
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), Channing Powell
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Chandler Riggs
Plot: While searching for Father Gabriel, the group comes across a mysterious new collective of survivors. Back at the Kingdom, Carol and Daryl have an emotional reunion.
